name: El Norte Salvaje, Juego De Cartas RPG
name_original: El Norte Salvaje, Juego De Cartas RPG
description:
THE WILD NORTH, RPG CARDS GAME

The Wild North, RPG card game, is a card game with a medieval and fantasy theme for one player in which we manage a hero who has at his disposal a reduced deck of cards of njs. The hero has his own abilities and inventory and will use the cards in the deck to advance through different scenarios until completing the campaign map.

This is my first game as an independent developer. In this first version you can play the main campaign, which consists of 55 scenarios, with the Warrior character class. In the following updates I will be adding several more classes as well as various game modes and campaigns.

Included in the release version:

- Campaign with 55 scenarios and a plot line.
- Warrior as main character.
- Inventory in the warrior.
- Three warrior skills.
- Fifteen cards that make up the warrior's deck. Cards are obtained by rescuing them from their captors, by leveling up, or by visiting certain locations.
- Skills both on the cards in the deck and on many enemies.
- Several scenarios are events which we will have to figure out the best way to deal with.
- Level up.
- Stores.
- Translated into English partially.
- Autosave at the beginning of each new scenario.

Roadmap

- Add the Ranger and Mage class to the characters.
- Both classes will have their own skills, spells and deck of cards.
- Complete campaign against the orcs.
- Duel game mode: against the campaign bosses the combat system will be different from the campaign one.
- Full translation into English.
